pr_title: EQL: Fix bug in sequences with any pattern

timeline.bodyText: I've sneaked this in since it affects running DataLoader#main instead of from a test.
timeline.author: costin

timeline.bodyText: Moved this to the base class.
timeline.author: costin

timeline.bodyText: The actual cause of the exception
timeline.author: costin

timeline.message:
EQL: Fix bug in sequences with any pattern

Fix query creation inside sequences with any queries due to lacking a
clause to combine, which lead to an invalid request being created.

Fix #62967
